Front: 🛠 How do you form the condicional simple?
Back:
Take the infinitive of the verb + these endings:
– yo -ía
– tú -ías
– él/ella/usted -ía
– nosotros/as -íamos
– vosotros/as -íais
– ellos/ellas/ustedes -ían

Examples:
– estar → estaría
– encantar → encantaría

Front: ❓ When do you use the condicional simple?
Back:
👉 To express a theoretical possibility
👉 To give advice

Examples:
– Me encantaría visitar Perú. (I would love to visit Peru.)
– Yo que tú, hablaría con él. (If I were you, I would talk to him.)

Front: 💡 Memory trick: How can you picture the condicional?
Back: Imagine yourself dreaming or imagining possibilities 🌙 — “what would happen if...”
